00042     public function init()
00043     {
00044         parent::init();
00045         
00046         //  Set base values
00047         $this->templatePath = Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'pogostick.templates.module' );
00048         
00049         $this->basePath = Yii::app()->getModulePath();
00050         $this->baseClass = 'CPSWebModule';
00051         $this->templateName = 'module.php';

00060     public function getHelp()
00061     {
00062         $_sName = $this->bold( $this->name );
00063         
00064         $_sOptions = $this->getDisplayOptions();
00065         
00066         return <<<EOD
00067 USAGE
00068   \033[1m{$_sName}\033[0m <\033[1mmodule-ID\033[0m> [options]
00069 
00070 DESCRIPTION
00071   This command generates an application module.
00072 
00073 PARAMETERS
00074   * module-ID: required, module ID. It is case-sensitive.
00075 
00076 OPTIONS
00077 
00078   -f, --force                  if the files exists, you will be able to 
00079                                    optionally overwrite them.
00080                                    
00081   -b, --base-class             The base class to use for generated controllers. 
00082                                    Defaults to 'CPSWebModule'
00083                                    
00084   -t, --template-path          The template path to use.
00085   
00086   -n, --template-name          The name of the template to use. 
00087                                    Defaults to 'module.php'
00088 
00089 {$_sOptions}
00090 
00091 EOD;
00092     }
00093 
00099     public function run( $arArgs )
00100     {
00101         //  Process arguments...
00102         $arArgs = $this->processArguments( $arArgs );
00103         
00104         //  Check args...
00105         if ( ! ( $_sModuleId = array_shift( $arArgs ) ) )
00106         {
00107             echo "\033[1mError\033[0m: model ID is required.\n";
00108             echo $this->getHelp();
00109             return;
00110         }
00111         
00112         $_sModuleClass = ucfirst( $_sModuleId ) . 'Module';
00113         $_sModulePath = Yii::app()->getModulePath() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sModuleId;
00114         $_sSourceDir = PS::nvl( $this->templatePath, YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/module' );
00115 
00116         $_arList = $this->buildFileList( $_sSourceDir, $_sModulePath );
00117 
00118         $_arList[ $this->templateName ][ 'target' ] = $_sModulePath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sModuleClass . '.php';
00119         $_arList[ $this->templateName ][ 'callback' ] = array( $this, 'generateFile' );
00120         $_arList[ $this->templateName ][ 'params' ] = array(
00121             'moduleClass' => $_sModuleClass,
00122             'moduleID' => $_sModuleId,
00123         );
00124 
00125         $_arList[ $_sModuleClass . '.php' ] = $_arList[ $this->templateName ];
00126         unset( $_arList[ $this->templateName ] );
00127 
00128         //  Show params
00129         $this->displayParameters( 'Module Generator', array( 'Output Path' => $_sModulePath ) );
00130             
00131         //  Generate
00132         $_arList = $this->copyFiles( $_arList );
00133         
00134         //  Display results...
00135         echo $this->getResultDisplay( $_arList );
00136     }
00137 
00138 }
